articles.title: Candidate in Ecuador's presidential election Fernando Villavicencio shot dead - BBC
articles.description: Anti-corruption campaigner Fernando Villavicencio is assassinated after an event in the capital, Quito.
articles.content:
Media caption, Fernando Villavicencio was shot as he left a rally in Quito
A candidate in Ecuador's forthcoming presidential election who campaigned against corruption and gangs has been shot dead a… [+4890 chars]
